titles.title: HOLY HOLY HOLY ARE YOU LORD

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Can You hear the sound of heaven
It's the sound of many waters
It's the sound of worship coming from the Throne
There are cries of adoration, as men from every nation
Lift their voice to make His glory known
Singing

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy are you Lord (2x)
The elders and the angels bow
The redeemed worship you now
Holy, holy, holy are you Lord.
